name: Perfect Accordion
author: ThemeUltra.com

sections.description: This is a accordion plugin to extend your website’s beauty and make it gorgeous. By activating this plugin user can get a custom post in Dashboard Menu With the name of “Accordion” as default accordion item. User can use any type of post as Accordion item like “post”. This plugin Generate multi-functional shortcode. shortcode make this easy and user friendly. Its work on page, post also widget.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use shortcode in page, post or in widgets.
  4. If you want Accordions in your theme php, Place <?php echo do_shortcode('[accordion]'); ?> in your templates, for more details visit Plugin’s Documentation by clicking here.
  5. After Activate Accordion U Can See a new menu “Accordion” in your Dashboard Menu.

  6. Than post your text which u want in Accordion.

  7. Default Query From Custom Post

[accordion]

2.From Any Post

[accordion post_from="post"]

3.How many post you want

[accordion count="2"]

4.How many post you want

[accordion class="st-four" count="2"]
